name: MEC AlpineLite 32 Backpack - Unisex
description: We overhauled the venerable AlpineLite Packs. Now they're leaned out and stripped back to the bones. Minimal padding, durable metal buckle, and no extra gack – designed for alpinists, climbers jetting up long routes and anyone aiming to cover serious distance in a day.Made of lightweight, strong 210-denier high tenacity nylon with a double layer bottom panel of 420-denier high tenacity nylon.Back panel and shoulder straps have minimal padding to reduce weight and bulk. Foam backpanel is removable.Webbing waistbelt and sternum strap with built in whistle are removable.Fixed lid has an outer zippered pocket and zippered pocket with a key clip.One-handed drawcord closure on the spindrift collar is glove-friendly.Dual ice axe holders use slim toggle to hold the axe head.Twin front daisy chains for lashing extra gear.Side compression straps consolidate the load.Low-profile metal buckles on compression straps and lid are more durable than plastic.Hose routing port in spindrift collar lets you add your own hydration reservoir. (No internal reservoir sleeve to save weight.)
